advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

cn.description:
Sismo vibration meter is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an earthquake is happening in their area. Measure all vibrations and earthquakes !

How it works

Seismometers are devices used to measure earthquakes. They are also known as seismographs or body tremors. Seismometers are used in seismology to measure the strength and direction of earthquakes.

Sismo uses the iPhone or iPad's accelerometer to detect vibrations in the ground. These vibrations are then analyzed to create a vibration spectrum. This spectrum is then compared to known earthquake waveforms. 

The Sismo iPhone App is the perfect tool for anyone interested in seismology or earthquakes. Sismo is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an sismic activity is happening in their area.

Check the vibrations with your phone!

Sismo is a seismometer that measures the vibration of the Earth. It is used to study earthquakes and tsunamis.One of the most important tools for seismologists is the seismometer, which is used to measure the vibration of the earth caused by earthquakes. The seismometer can also be used to measure the body tremor of people suffering from Parkinson's disease.


Measure vibrations with iPad or iPhone. Always see these vibes with great viewing options.

Customize the application with your own colors with 4 views.

Special Views ;

● OSCILLOSCOPE
The oscilloscope view is arranged for a full hollywood effect and is enjoyable to watch on your iPad or iPhone at your desk.

● METRONOME
Metronome view detects harsh vibrations and has a plain appearance.

● GEYSER
Geyser view also includes an alarm function and will easily show you the smallest movements like a geyser. You can set the threshold of vibrations listening and the threshold at which the Alarm will sound.

● WAVE
The wave appearance can be set as a straight wave or a moving wave, allowing you to measure with high precision.

Many views give you the chance to make a full screen. This allows you to focus on data only. You can also use it as a hollywood effect. People around you will be amazed when they see the cinematic view on your device.

In addition, you can customize the entire appearance through the settings tab, if you are using your device with a stand, you can easily control the tilt of your stand with the bubble level function, which you can access under the settings tab and you can make accurate measurements with a perfectly flat floor.

cn.description:
我们的应用实时连接到YouTube，让您播放任何视频，并拥有专为您设计的独家功能！
主要功能亮点：
• 锁屏播放：在后台持续收听您视频的音频。
• 浮动播放（画中画）：在观看视频时使用其他应用。
• 睡眠定时器：设置自动关闭，安心放松。
• 循环模式：无限循环播放您喜欢的视频。
此外还包括：
• 可切换字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 质量选择和全屏模式
• 智能搜索，实时建议（预测搜索）
• 上传日期筛选：按天、周、月或年
FyTube非常适合不想错过任何喜欢主题视频的用户。
尽情探索、播放并享受您喜爱的内容——无干扰！

特别功能
浮动播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他应用时继续观看视频。
只需进入全屏模式，点击画中画按钮——它是播放器顶部的第二个图标。
无论打开哪个应用，您的视频都会浮动在屏幕顶部！

锁屏播放
无中断收听！
即使屏幕关闭，也能继续享受视频音频。非常适合开车或休息时听音乐、播客或喜欢的曲目。
如何激活？
只需锁定设备屏幕，即刻会看到后台播放器。
点击播放——音频将持续不断。

睡眠定时器
安然入睡——应用会自动停止！
启用此功能后，视频将在您设定的时间后自动停止。非常适合睡觉或小憩，无需担心忘记关闭。
如何激活？
点击定时器按钮，选择运行时间，就完成了。
放松，剩下的交给应用！

循环模式
反复播放您喜欢的视频！
启用此功能，视频会自动重复播放任意次数。
怎么知道它是否开启？
激活时图标会变红。
（支持VoiceOver：会提示开启或关闭状态。）
非常适合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜欢反复播放的内容！

需要帮助使用这些功能？访问：fydub.com/fytube

hk.releaseNotes:
遊戲現已新增商店，未來將持續加入新功能和原型！
遊戲價格已永久下調 90%。
上一版本包含技術更新，提升了優化效果。
hk.description:
你正在閱讀這段文字。
但為何？
你是在尋找一款遊戲，
還是遊戲已找到你？
《宗教公司》不僅僅是一款策略遊戲。
它是創造新現實的模擬。
你會塑造信仰，
還是信仰會塑造你？
人類一直在黑暗中尋找光明。
一直渴望相信一些更偉大的事物，
那些賦予存在意義的東西。
這就是宗教誕生的原因——
作為歷史風暴中的燈塔，
作為生命海洋中的指南針。
如果你成為一個宗教的創造者會怎樣？
如果你可以建立自己的信仰、自己的真理、自己的現實呢？
你是創造者。
你是源頭。
你是靈感。
如果你在閱讀這段文字——你已經在遊戲中！
剩下的就是安裝——並享受創造宗教的過程與模擬！

成為信仰的源泉——在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中。

人類一直感受到相信比自己更偉大的事物的需求。在歷史長河中，人們一直在尋找能引導他們穿越黑暗的光。對數百萬人來說，那光成為信仰。宗教成為燈塔，幫助許多人在這個世界找到意義，經受變革的風暴，並找到通往幸福的道路。

世界上有許多宗教，每一種都受到其時代與挑戰的塑造。但這個過程還能如何發展？人類的信仰又可能呈現出哪些迷人而多樣的形式？答案就在我們的新遊戲中！創建你獨一無二的宗教，經歷時間的考驗，看看它是否能引領人類走向團結。

遊戲特色
* 多樣的宗教原型，具有獨特的文化價值與傳統！
* 通過遊戲解鎖所有原型：一神教、靈性主義、萬神殿、薩滿教、異教等！
* 你的追隨者會成為狂熱的信徒還是達到更高的覺悟？選擇在你！
* 數百個現實世界的宗教元素——未來還有更多！了解更多世界宗教！
* 每個原型都具有獨特的主動能力——行奇蹟，改變世界！
* 放鬆的遊戲玩法，非常適合晚上休息時：用簡單的點擊收集信仰點，探索各種宗教元素。按照自己的節奏遊玩，享受其中！

在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中，通過結合不同的宗教元素，創建你獨一無二的宗教。

願和平與愛與所有兄弟姐妹同在！

hk.description:
Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience.

Some of the key features that VidHub offers include:
- Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud
- Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv, and more
- High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions
- The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB
- Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services.
- Support downloading and deleting cloud files
- Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method.
- Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server.
- Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more.

All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire.

Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
https://okaapps.com/privacy_vidhub
https://okaapps.com/terms_vidhub

hk.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!​

BECOME OVERPOWERED

Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours!

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

hk.description:
Sismo vibration meter is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an earthquake is happening in their area. Measure all vibrations and earthquakes !

How it works

Seismometers are devices used to measure earthquakes. They are also known as seismographs or body tremors. Seismometers are used in seismology to measure the strength and direction of earthquakes.

Sismo uses the iPhone or iPad's accelerometer to detect vibrations in the ground. These vibrations are then analyzed to create a vibration spectrum. This spectrum is then compared to known earthquake waveforms. 

The Sismo iPhone App is the perfect tool for anyone interested in seismology or earthquakes. Sismo is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an sismic activity is happening in their area.

Check the vibrations with your phone!

Sismo is a seismometer that measures the vibration of the Earth. It is used to study earthquakes and tsunamis.One of the most important tools for seismologists is the seismometer, which is used to measure the vibration of the earth caused by earthquakes. The seismometer can also be used to measure the body tremor of people suffering from Parkinson's disease.


Measure vibrations with iPad or iPhone. Always see these vibes with great viewing options.

Customize the application with your own colors with 4 views.

Special Views ;

● OSCILLOSCOPE
The oscilloscope view is arranged for a full hollywood effect and is enjoyable to watch on your iPad or iPhone at your desk.

● METRONOME
Metronome view detects harsh vibrations and has a plain appearance.

● GEYSER
Geyser view also includes an alarm function and will easily show you the smallest movements like a geyser. You can set the threshold of vibrations listening and the threshold at which the Alarm will sound.

● WAVE
The wave appearance can be set as a straight wave or a moving wave, allowing you to measure with high precision.

Many views give you the chance to make a full screen. This allows you to focus on data only. You can also use it as a hollywood effect. People around you will be amazed when they see the cinematic view on your device.

In addition, you can customize the entire appearance through the settings tab, if you are using your device with a stand, you can easily control the tilt of your stand with the bubble level function, which you can access under the settings tab and you can make accurate measurements with a perfectly flat floor.

遊戲以治療入侵者到來猛攻成為保護地牢守護者！
盲目地扔你有武器，它必須以免攻擊地牢。
級別和項目養殖，地牢重塑，從性能的保證，雅可怕的敵人當心！

拉什是世界上所有的怪物，以期佔領這個世界的最後一個地牢，
勇敢和亨特，旨在保證這個怪物，放在幫助。

◈請盡量協同作用，並使用武器的不同！
◈準時提供一個新的擔保實現的結果！

在那裡，恢復魔界的力量，並擊敗光之軍隊吧。

◇ 重建度越高，魔界的力量就越來越強大

mo.description:
你正在閱讀這段文字。
但為何？
你是在尋找一款遊戲，
還是遊戲已找到你？
《宗教公司》不僅僅是一款策略遊戲。
它是創造新現實的模擬。
你會塑造信仰，
還是信仰會塑造你？
人類一直在黑暗中尋找光明。
一直渴望相信一些更偉大的事物，
那些賦予存在意義的東西。
這就是宗教誕生的原因——
作為歷史風暴中的燈塔，
作為生命海洋中的指南針。
如果你成為一個宗教的創造者會怎樣？
如果你可以建立自己的信仰、自己的真理、自己的現實呢？
你是創造者。
你是源頭。
你是靈感。
如果你在閱讀這段文字——你已經在遊戲中！
剩下的就是安裝——並享受創造宗教的過程與模擬！

成為信仰的源泉——在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中。

人類一直感受到相信比自己更偉大的事物的需求。在歷史長河中，人們一直在尋找能引導他們穿越黑暗的光。對數百萬人來說，那光成為信仰。宗教成為燈塔，幫助許多人在這個世界找到意義，經受變革的風暴，並找到通往幸福的道路。

世界上有許多宗教，每一種都受到其時代與挑戰的塑造。但這個過程還能如何發展？人類的信仰又可能呈現出哪些迷人而多樣的形式？答案就在我們的新遊戲中！創建你獨一無二的宗教，經歷時間的考驗，看看它是否能引領人類走向團結。

遊戲特色
* 多樣的宗教原型，具有獨特的文化價值與傳統！
* 通過遊戲解鎖所有原型：一神教、靈性主義、萬神殿、薩滿教、異教等！
* 你的追隨者會成為狂熱的信徒還是達到更高的覺悟？選擇在你！
* 數百個現實世界的宗教元素——未來還有更多！了解更多世界宗教！
* 每個原型都具有獨特的主動能力——行奇蹟，改變世界！
* 放鬆的遊戲玩法，非常適合晚上休息時：用簡單的點擊收集信仰點，探索各種宗教元素。按照自己的節奏遊玩，享受其中！

在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中，通過結合不同的宗教元素，創建你獨一無二的宗教。

願和平與愛與所有兄弟姐妹同在！

mo.description:
Play MONOPOLY on the go without distractions – no ads, no fuss! 

Challenge friends, family and fans from around the globe in the digital version of the official MONOPOLY board game, licensed by Hasbro. 

Head online to play your favourite board game with anyone, anywhere, at any time, or compete against state-of-the-art AI opponents offline. Plus, with the seamless PASS & PLAY mode, you can play the classic MONOPOLY board game with your friends with just one device! 

The classic MONOPOLY board game takes a bold leap into a new format, arriving on mobile with amazing graphics, smooth animations and a catchy soundtrack! 


HOW TO PLAY MONOPOLY

1. Download the official MONOPOLY app
2. Press “PLAY”
3. Pick a mode, board, dice and token
4. Roll the dice and move around the board
5. If you land on a property tile, you can buy it
6. Collect rent when other players land on it
7. Continue around the board, drawing cards when instructed – will you be hit with a surprise tax? Sent to jail? Or get a little bonus money? 
8. If you run out of money, you’ll be bankrupt and out of the game
9. The last player left with a profit wins! 

FEATURES

- MONOPOLY ON THE GO – No connection? No problem. Our roster of AI opponents are ready to challenge you! Or play with your friends offline with Pass & Play! 
- MULTIPLE MODES – Take on AI opponents in Single Player or compete against friends and family in Pass & Play or Online With Friends. Try out Online Multiplayer and face off against fellow tycoons from around the world! 
- EXCLUSIVE BOARDS – Experience the iconic board game like never before with exclusive boards and more! 
- AWESOME NEW TOKENS AND DICE – Whatever your style, MONOPOLY has a set of dice fit for a future tycoon! Pick from nostalgic classic tokens or brand-new designs exclusive to the mobile game.

Get the most authentic MONOPOLY experience with the official MONOPOLY mobile game!

The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the gameboard, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment. © 1935, 2025 Hasbro. All Rights Reserved.

mo.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：
• 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。
• 浮動播放（畫中畫）：在觀看視頻時使用其他應用。
• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。
• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：
• 可切換字幕
• 播放速度控制

FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

浮動播放

只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。
無論打開哪個應用，您的視頻都會浮動在螢幕頂部！

鎖屏播放
無中斷收聽！
即使螢幕關閉，也能繼續享受視頻音頻。非常適合開車或休息時聽音樂、播客或喜歡的曲目。
如何激活？
只需鎖定設備螢幕，即刻會看到後台播放器。
點擊播放——音頻將持續不斷。

睡眠定時器
安然入睡——應用會自動停止！
啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。

點擊定時器按鈕，選擇運行時間，就完成了。
放鬆，剩下的交給應用！

循環模式
反覆播放您喜歡的視頻！

mo.trackName: 地牢防禦 : 勇士的侵入
mo.description:
GameCoaster你想一個有趣的遊戲，但小一開發商的第二個工作

※ 最有可能引進
遊戲以治療入侵者到來猛攻成為保護地牢守護者！
盲目地扔你有武器，它必須以免攻擊地牢。
級別和項目養殖，地牢重塑，從性能的保證，雅可怕的敵人當心！

※ 故事
拉什是世界上所有的怪物，以期佔領這個世界的最後一個地牢，
勇敢和亨特，旨在保證這個怪物，放在幫助。
為了保護地牢入侵者，你可以拿出已經堆成了一座武器。

※ 遊戲特色
◈請盡量記住復古的圖形和聲音的懷舊回憶。
◈容易玩，任何人都可以很容易地享受。
◈高興地屠殺敵人即將到來喉嚨按丈夫！它給人以強烈的打擊感和愉悅。
◈請盡量協同作用，並使用武器的不同！
◈準時提供一個新的擔保實現的結果！

-SUPPORT-
E-Mail : support@gamecoaster.com
Tel :+82 10-4178-0283

@ GameCoaster

Dungeon Maker與Dungeon Defense開發商＂Game Cosater＂的最新力作！

因無數勇者們的侵略，副本已成廢墟，魔界也遭受破壞。
你為了重建魔界，需要侵略勇者們的根據地。
在那裡，恢復魔界的力量，並擊敗光之軍隊吧。

擊敗勇者，並以他們為祭品，召喚出怪物作為你的夥伴吧，
同時也要從勇者身上奪取裝備來武裝。

得到強大的力量，就可以獲得魔界之魔神們的祝福。
接合魔神與怪物的力量，壓制巨大的勇者軍團吧。

◇ 重建度越高，魔界的力量就越來越強大
◇ 隨機選擇與機會所構成的Roguelike玩法

謝謝。

tw.description:
你正在閱讀這段文字。
但為何？
你是在尋找一款遊戲，
還是遊戲已找到你？
《宗教公司》不僅僅是一款策略遊戲。
它是創造新現實的模擬。
你會塑造信仰，
還是信仰會塑造你？
人類一直在黑暗中尋找光明。
一直渴望相信一些更偉大的事物，
那些賦予存在意義的東西。
這就是宗教誕生的原因——
作為歷史風暴中的燈塔，
作為生命海洋中的指南針。
如果你成為一個宗教的創造者會怎樣？
如果你可以建立自己的信仰、自己的真理、自己的現實呢？
你是創造者。
你是源頭。
你是靈感。
如果你在閱讀這段文字——你已經在遊戲中！
剩下的就是安裝——並享受創造宗教的過程與模擬！

成為信仰的源泉——在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中。

人類一直感受到相信比自己更偉大的事物的需求。在歷史長河中，人們一直在尋找能引導他們穿越黑暗的光。對數百萬人來說，那光成為信仰。宗教成為燈塔，幫助許多人在這個世界找到意義，經受變革的風暴，並找到通往幸福的道路。

世界上有許多宗教，每一種都受到其時代與挑戰的塑造。但這個過程還能如何發展？人類的信仰又可能呈現出哪些迷人而多樣的形式？答案就在我們的新遊戲中！創建你獨一無二的宗教，經歷時間的考驗，看看它是否能引領人類走向團結。

遊戲特色
* 多樣的宗教原型，具有獨特的文化價值與傳統！
* 通過遊戲解鎖所有原型：一神教、靈性主義、萬神殿、薩滿教、異教等！
* 你的追隨者會成為狂熱的信徒還是達到更高的覺悟？選擇在你！
* 數百個現實世界的宗教元素——未來還有更多！了解更多世界宗教！
* 每個原型都具有獨特的主動能力——行奇蹟，改變世界！
* 放鬆的遊戲玩法，非常適合晚上休息時：用簡單的點擊收集信仰點，探索各種宗教元素。按照自己的節奏遊玩，享受其中！

在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中，通過結合不同的宗教元素，創建你獨一無二的宗教。

願和平與愛與所有兄弟姐妹同在！

tw.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!​

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!​

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours!

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

tw.trackName: 照片橡皮擦 - 去除水印雜物多余人物
tw.description:
妳還在為照片上不請自來的過客犯愁嗎？
使用照片橡皮擦，有瑕疵的照片瞬間修復，變成完美收藏。
照片橡皮擦可以輕松幫妳去除圖片上的電線、人物、圖標、水印、文字等等雜物，就和拍照壹樣簡單。
照片橡皮擦使用智能算法自動填補受損和缺失的區域，智能填充來到了妳的手機，P圖再也不需要壹臺電腦。
特點：
- 刪除多余的人物
- 擦除照片上的電線
- 擦除臉上的粉刺，黑痣
- 修復有劃痕的舊照片
- 去除照片上意外的移動物體
- 去除照片上的水印、日期等等等等
- 簡單易用

什麽，還有不能完成的其他P圖任務，看看我們的其他軟件，總有壹款能幫到妳：
• 輕松摳圖 - 史上最強摳圖神器.
• 色彩大師 - 改變照片顏色,黑白多彩特效.
• 美圖聚焦 - 虛化背景, 模糊背景, 美化照片, 突出運動健美的妳.
• 奇幻變臉秀 - 制作變臉動畫，照片變視頻，GIF圖片.

給我們壹個評論，幫助我們提高app的功能！

tw.description:
Sismo vibration meter is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an earthquake is happening in their area. Measure all vibrations and earthquakes !

How it works

Seismometers are devices used to measure earthquakes. They are also known as seismographs or body tremors. Seismometers are used in seismology to measure the strength and direction of earthquakes.

Sismo uses the iPhone or iPad's accelerometer to detect vibrations in the ground. These vibrations are then analyzed to create a vibration spectrum. This spectrum is then compared to known earthquake waveforms. 

The Sismo iPhone App is the perfect tool for anyone interested in seismology or earthquakes. Sismo is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an sismic activity is happening in their area.

Check the vibrations with your phone!

Sismo is a seismometer that measures the vibration of the Earth. It is used to study earthquakes and tsunamis.One of the most important tools for seismologists is the seismometer, which is used to measure the vibration of the earth caused by earthquakes. The seismometer can also be used to measure the body tremor of people suffering from Parkinson's disease.


Measure vibrations with iPad or iPhone. Always see these vibes with great viewing options.

Customize the application with your own colors with 4 views.

Special Views ;

● OSCILLOSCOPE
The oscilloscope view is arranged for a full hollywood effect and is enjoyable to watch on your iPad or iPhone at your desk.

● METRONOME
Metronome view detects harsh vibrations and has a plain appearance.

● GEYSER
Geyser view also includes an alarm function and will easily show you the smallest movements like a geyser. You can set the threshold of vibrations listening and the threshold at which the Alarm will sound.

● WAVE
The wave appearance can be set as a straight wave or a moving wave, allowing you to measure with high precision.

Many views give you the chance to make a full screen. This allows you to focus on data only. You can also use it as a hollywood effect. People around you will be amazed when they see the cinematic view on your device.

In addition, you can customize the entire appearance through the settings tab, if you are using your device with a stand, you can easily control the tilt of your stand with the bubble level function, which you can access under the settings tab and you can make accurate measurements with a perfectly flat floor.

us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

us.description:
MoneyTrack - Smart Personal Finance Tracker
Record every dollar, take control of your finances. A clutter-free budgeting app with zero ads, zero splash screens, and zero financial product promotions.

■ KEY FEATURES
• Auto-Tracking: Seamlessly integrates with Shortcuts for automatic expense capture triggered by your transactions
• Versatile Entries: Track income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management
• Powerful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns through pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly spot financial issues
• Smart Budgeting: Create annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily allowance adjustments

■ COMPREHENSIVE ASSET MANAGEMENT
• Unified dashboard for all account types (cash, checking accounts, credit cards, store cards)
• Balance sheet and net worth tracking for real-time financial status monitoring
• Credit card management system (payment alerts, limit tracking, grace period calculation)
• Multi-currency support with exchange rates for all major world currencies

■ SMART FEATURES
• Multiple Books: Easily separate personal, business, and project finances
• Collaborative Tracking: Invite family members to create transparent household finances
• Cloud Sync: Free data backup across devices with secure protection
• Easy Import/Export: Support for importing from banking apps and exporting to Excel
• Recurring Transactions: Set up automatic entries that generate on schedule
• Payment Plans: Track installment payments with due date reminders
• Custom Categories: Create unlimited category levels to match your financial organization

■ MULTI-DEVICE EXPERIENCE
Sync between iPhone, iPad and PC with instant updates, keeping your financial picture complete no matter where you are.

■ FOCUSED ON FINANCIAL WELLNESS
We're dedicated to one mission — helping you achieve financial clarity. No investment pitches, no social distractions, just a clean and effective expense tracking experience.

us.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!​

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!​

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours!

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

us.description:
Polygon: "My Child Lebensborn tells a disturbing tale about innocents in the aftermath of WW2”
LevelUp: “The strongest game experience that I have ever had.”

You adopt a young Lebensborn child in Norway after WW2, but parenting will be hard as your child grows up in a hostile and hateful environment. See a different side of the war, inspired by the true stories of the Lebensborn children. Discover how hatred of our enemies continues to create victims, even after victory.

Discover their past and support them in the present. You must balance your time and resources to provide for your child. You will find answers to the hard questions; about their history, the hatred, bullying and the passing of blame.

Can you help Klaus/Karin cope with the heavy inheritance of the German occupation, so they will find their place in a country that is celebrating its freedom? 
You can make the difference.
 
Key Features:
 - Influence the child’s feelings, personality and worldview through your choices.
 - Look for the effects of your choices in your child’s expressions and body language.
 - Explore a gripping storyline based upon true events.
 - Earn money as you work, then cook, craft, forage, and play.
 - Use your time and meager resources wisely.
 - Adopt a boy or girl, and support them through a defining year of their life.

What is new in the Remaster?
More activities:
Spend more time with your child and enjoy a variety of activities together as your little one grows. 
- Try out more recipes
- Craft pine cone animals
- Skip stones at the lake
- Pick flowers in the forest
- Enjoy seasonal activities together
And More!
Perhaps there is a new way of using the newspaper clippings that you get in the mail every now and then?



Make new memories:
Your journal now holds more memories from the year you spent together with your child. Who can throw away the beautiful flowers you picked out together on a beautiful spring day? Decorate the rooms with your memories. Your journal will hold your struggles, as well as the happy moments.

Interact with your child:
Play and interact with your child more freely in this remastered version. Manage your time and resources while trying as many activities with your child as possible! Money is limited as always, but perhaps there are more reasons to not work overtime after all.



Improved Graphics: 
Bringing My Child Lebensborn's graphics to today's level, tickle and pet your child to get heartwarming reactions out of them! The beauty of Norwegian nature is now more apparent, and you have more things to do outdoors!

Caution: Some devices with only 1GB available memory have shown problems with running this game.

For technical support, please contact us at support@sareptastudio.com

us.description:
Sismo vibration meter is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an earthquake is happening in their area. Measure all vibrations and earthquakes !

How it works

Seismometers are devices used to measure earthquakes. They are also known as seismographs or body tremors. Seismometers are used in seismology to measure the strength and direction of earthquakes.

Sismo uses the iPhone or iPad's accelerometer to detect vibrations in the ground. These vibrations are then analyzed to create a vibration spectrum. This spectrum is then compared to known earthquake waveforms. 

The Sismo iPhone App is the perfect tool for anyone interested in seismology or earthquakes. Sismo is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an sismic activity is happening in their area.

Check the vibrations with your phone!

Sismo is a seismometer that measures the vibration of the Earth. It is used to study earthquakes and tsunamis.One of the most important tools for seismologists is the seismometer, which is used to measure the vibration of the earth caused by earthquakes. The seismometer can also be used to measure the body tremor of people suffering from Parkinson's disease.


Measure vibrations with iPad or iPhone. Always see these vibes with great viewing options.

Customize the application with your own colors with 4 views.

Special Views ;

● OSCILLOSCOPE
The oscilloscope view is arranged for a full hollywood effect and is enjoyable to watch on your iPad or iPhone at your desk.

● METRONOME
Metronome view detects harsh vibrations and has a plain appearance.

● GEYSER
Geyser view also includes an alarm function and will easily show you the smallest movements like a geyser. You can set the threshold of vibrations listening and the threshold at which the Alarm will sound.

● WAVE
The wave appearance can be set as a straight wave or a moving wave, allowing you to measure with high precision.

Many views give you the chance to make a full screen. This allows you to focus on data only. You can also use it as a hollywood effect. People around you will be amazed when they see the cinematic view on your device.

In addition, you can customize the entire appearance through the settings tab, if you are using your device with a stand, you can easily control the tilt of your stand with the bubble level function, which you can access under the settings tab and you can make accurate measurements with a perfectly flat floor.

us.description:
Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you!
Highlight Features:
• Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos’ audio in the background.
• Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos.
• Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free.
• Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat.
It also includes:
• Toggleable subtitles
• Playback speed control
• Quality selection and fullscreen mode
• Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search)
• Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year
FyTube is perfect for those who don’t want to miss a single video about their favorite topics.
Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest — interruption-free!

SPECIAL FEATURES
FLOATING PLAYBACK
Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps .
Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button — it’s the second icon at the top of the player.
Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open!

LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK
Listen without interruptions!
Keep enjoying your video’s audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing.
How to activate it?
Just lock your device screen. You’ll instantly see the background player.
Tap Play — and that’s it! The audio will keep going without pauses.

SLEEP TIMER
Fall asleep peacefully — your app will stop by itself!
Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything.
How to activate it?
Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that’s it.
Relax and let the app handle the rest!

LOOP MODE
Play your favorite video over and over again!
Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want.
How to know if it’s on?
The icon will turn red when active.
(VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it’s on or off.)
Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat!

Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube

BASIC FEATURES
• Fullscreen high-quality video playback
• Easy-to-use interface, friendly design
• Skip forward or rewind anytime — never miss the best parts
• Subtitle activation
• Adjust playback speed to your preference
• Change video quality
• Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all
• Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content
• Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news
• Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video
• Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device
• VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions)
• No account required
• We don’t store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission — watch safely
• Interface available in 29 languages
• NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS
Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience — ad-free and subscription-free.

tr.description:
Sismo vibration meter is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an earthquake is happening in their area. Measure all vibrations and earthquakes !

How it works

Seismometers are devices used to measure earthquakes. They are also known as seismographs or body tremors. Seismometers are used in seismology to measure the strength and direction of earthquakes.

Sismo uses the iPhone or iPad's accelerometer to detect vibrations in the ground. These vibrations are then analyzed to create a vibration spectrum. This spectrum is then compared to known earthquake waveforms. 

The Sismo iPhone App is the perfect tool for anyone interested in seismology or earthquakes. Sismo is analyzes the data from the iPhone or iPad accelerometer and builds a vibration spectrum. This allows users to see if an sismic activity is happening in their area.

Check the vibrations with your phone!

Sismo is a seismometer that measures the vibration of the Earth. It is used to study earthquakes and tsunamis.One of the most important tools for seismologists is the seismometer, which is used to measure the vibration of the earth caused by earthquakes. The seismometer can also be used to measure the body tremor of people suffering from Parkinson's disease.


Measure vibrations with iPad or iPhone. Always see these vibes with great viewing options.

Customize the application with your own colors with 4 views.

Special Views ;

● OSCILLOSCOPE
The oscilloscope view is arranged for a full hollywood effect and is enjoyable to watch on your iPad or iPhone at your desk.

● METRONOME
Metronome view detects harsh vibrations and has a plain appearance.

● GEYSER
Geyser view also includes an alarm function and will easily show you the smallest movements like a geyser. You can set the threshold of vibrations listening and the threshold at which the Alarm will sound.

● WAVE
The wave appearance can be set as a straight wave or a moving wave, allowing you to measure with high precision.

Many views give you the chance to make a full screen. This allows you to focus on data only. You can also use it as a hollywood effect. People around you will be amazed when they see the cinematic view on your device.

In addition, you can customize the entire appearance through the settings tab, if you are using your device with a stand, you can easily control the tilt of your stand with the bubble level function, which you can access under the settings tab and you can make accurate measurements with a perfectly flat floor.

tr.description:
Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you!
Highlight Features:

It also includes:
• Toggleable subtitles
• Playback speed control
• Quality selection and fullscreen mode

• Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year
FyTube is perfect for those who don’t want to miss a single video about their favorite topics.
Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest — interruption-free!

SPECIAL FEATURES
FLOATING PLAYBACK
Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps .
Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button — it’s the second icon at the top of the player.
Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open!

LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK
Listen without interruptions!
Keep enjoying your video’s audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing.
How to activate it?
Just lock your device screen. You’ll instantly see the background player.
Tap Play — and that’s it! The audio will keep going without pauses.

SLEEP TIMER
Fall asleep peacefully — your app will stop by itself!
Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything.
How to activate it?
Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that’s it.
Relax and let the app handle the rest!

LOOP MODE
Play your favorite video over and over again!
Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want.
How to know if it’s on?
The icon will turn red when active.
(VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it’s on or off.)
Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat!
